an4.184:4.1: Atha kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an4.184:4.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an4.184:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an4.184:5.2: ‘natthi yo maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati, na santāsaṃ āpajjati maraṇassā’”ti.
an4.184:5.3: “Atthi, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṃ āpajjati maraṇassa;
an4.184:5.4: atthi pana, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati, na santāsaṃ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4.184:6.1: Katamo ca, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṃ āpajjati maraṇassa?
an4.184:6.2: Idha, brāhmaṇa, ekacco kāmesu avītarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho.
an4.184:6.4: Tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rogātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa evaṃ hoti:
an4.184:6.5: ‘piyā vata maṃ kāmā jahissanti, piye cāhaṃ kāme jahissāmī’ti.
an4.184:6.6: So socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṃ kandati, sammohaṃ āpajjati.
an4.184:6.7: Ayaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṃ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4.184:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco kāye avītarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho.
an4.184:7.3: Tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rogātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa evaṃ hoti:
an4.184:7.4: ‘piyo vata maṃ kāyo jahissati, piyañcāhaṃ kāyaṃ jahissāmī’ti.
an4.184:7.5: So socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṃ kandati, sammohaṃ āpajjati.
an4.184:7.6: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṃ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4.184:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco akatakalyāṇo hoti akatakusalo akatabhīruttāṇo katapāpo kataluddo katakibbiso.
an4.184:8.3: Tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rogātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa evaṃ hoti:
an4.184:8.4: ‘akataṃ vata me kalyāṇaṃ, akataṃ kusalaṃ, akataṃ bhīruttāṇaṃ;
an4.184:8.5: kataṃ pāpaṃ, kataṃ luddaṃ, kataṃ kibbisaṃ.
an4.184:8.6: Yāvatā, bho, akatakalyāṇānaṃ akatakusalānaṃ akatabhīruttāṇānaṃ katapāpānaṃ kataluddānaṃ katakibbisānaṃ gati taṃ gatiṃ pecca gacchāmī’ti.
an4.184:8.7: So socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṃ kandati, sammohaṃ āpajjati.
an4.184:8.8: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṃ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4.184:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco kaṅkhī hoti vicikicchī aniṭṭhaṅgato saddhamme.
an4.184:9.3: Tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rogātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa evaṃ hoti:
an4.184:9.5: So socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṃ kandati, sammohaṃ āpajjati.
an4.184:9.6: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṃ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4.184:9.7: Ime kho, brāhmaṇa, cattāro maraṇadhammā samānā bhāyanti, santāsaṃ āpajjanti maraṇassa.
an4.184:10.1: Katamo ca, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati, na santāsaṃ āpajjati maraṇassa?
an4.184:10.2: Idha, brāhmaṇa, ekacco kāmesu vītarāgo hoti vigatacchando vigatapemo vigatapipāso vigatapariḷāho vigatataṇho.
an4.184:10.4: Tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rogātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa na evaṃ hoti:
an4.184:10.5: ‘piyā vata maṃ kāmā jahissanti, piye cāhaṃ kāme jahissāmī’ti.
an4.184:10.6: So na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattāḷiṃ kandati, na sammohaṃ āpajjati.
an4.184:10.7: Ayaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati, na santāsaṃ āpajjati maraṇassa.

an4.184:14.1: “Abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama … pe … upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
